title.en: Kyou mo Uchi de Machi Awase

description.en:
Growing up in the same apartment complex, Kou-chan was like a big brother to Hina-chan, with nine years difference in age between them. As adults, the two lost contact with each other, but when Hina-chan and her young daughter lose their home, fate throws the childhood friends together once again. Could this be a new beginning for the two of them?

[b]Indonesian[/b]:[spoiler]
Tumbuh dalam apartemen yang sama, dengan perbedaan sembilan tahun diantara mereka, Kou-chan sudah seperti kakak bagi Hina-chan. . Saat dewasa, mereka berdua saling kehilangan komunikasi, namun saat Hina-chan beserta anaknya kehilangan tempat tinggal, Takdir mempertemukan mereka kembali. akankah ini jadi awal yang baru dari hubungan mereka?[/spoiler]

[b]Português:[/b][spoiler]
Rin é conhecida pelo seu jeito "masculino" e por causa de disso, ela desiste de ser feminina. Não é como se ela não quisesse isso e quando Ibuki, um garoto popular faz ela se lembrar que ainda é uma garota, isso acerta o seu coração...[/spoiler]
